segments.text: Hi Brittany . What are you doing with all of your clothes on your bed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm trying to decide what to wear to school the first day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , A . Mom didn't tell you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This Bs ' school you're going to is going to make your life easy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you talking about brother ? Spill it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uniforms , sis , no more worrying about appearances !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean I have to wear the same thing every day ? MOM !
segments.speaker: S2
